level.heading: Date merger or consolidation completed.
level.text: The merger or consolidation shall be complete when the Mayor issues under § 31-4451(c)(3)(C) the certificate of merger or consolidation to the new or surviving company.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 5-160, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 31-4443.
